Text: NoPhone is a company that manufactures a plastic object that resembles a smartphone.

Text: NoPhone:  The company manufactures four different types, the NoPhone, NoPhone Zero, and NoPhone Air and NoPhone Selfie.

<Text: NoPhone:  The solid bricks of plastic are marketed as being ""completely toilet-bowl resistant".">
